name: Rock Guy
description:
Rock Guy is a fantasy adventure game, inspired by Wall-E and Dark Souls. This project includes procedural  animation, advanced lighting, and reasonably smart AI.  Explore the open world and uncover all of its mysteries.

This game is experimental and will be updated almost daily.

Please comment with any suggestions on improvement or features You'd like to see added. 

Update 0.00.21 : Updated tree palette, added new enemy AI to fortress area, spread out weapons and shields across map. 

Update 0.00.20 : Updated trees, and optimized for lower-end systems.

Update 0.00.19 : Optimized trees, lighting, and mesh batching. Also added inventory/ pickup system. (controls.txt has been updated)
